description.sun-moon:
Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If
the user’s previous move has failed, the power of
this move doubles.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If
the user’s previous move has failed, the power of
this move doubles.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If
the user’s previous move has failed, the power of
this move doubles.
description.sword-shield:
Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target.
If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of
this move doubles.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is doubled if the user's last move failed for any reason (i.e., produced the message "But it failed!") or was ineffective due to types.
effect.shortEffect: Has double power if the user's last move failed.
